about_the_game:
Embark on a journey back to the dawn of life and immerse yourself in the ultimate prehistoric survival experience. Wild Kingdom puts you in control of the planet’s most fearsome and awe-inspiring creatures. From ferocious predators to towering herbivores, fight for your place in a brutal and ever-changing world where only the strongest survive.

  • Play as Iconic Prehistoric Animals: Choose from a wide range of prehistoric creatures. Each species brings unique abilities, hunting styles, and survival tactics.

  • Survival of the Fittest: Every day is a struggle for survival. Hunt, forage, or scavenge for food while avoiding larger predators. Stay alert—nature itself is one of your greatest threats.

  • Multiplayer Ecosystem: Thrive in a living, breathing ecosystem with other players. Form alliances, create herds, or engage in fierce battles for territory. Cooperation may be key to survival, but betrayal is never far away.

  • Advanced AI Behaviors: AI reacts realistically to their environment, hunting in packs, migrating, and defending their territory. Predators stalk prey, and herbivores form herds to stay safe from danger.

  • Territory and Nest Building: Mark your territory and build nests or dens to protect your offspring.

  • Breeding and Family Systems: Find a mate and start a family! Raise offspring by protecting them from threats, teaching them how to survive, and ensuring your lineage continues.

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain scenes of hunting, predation, and territorial conflict, which could involve brief depictions of animal injuries and death. Environmental threats and survival-based challenges are designed to reflect the raw and sometimes intense nature of a natural ecosystem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for co-op

short_description: Step into the wild, the untamed world of Earth, where you'll take control of a wide variety of animals. Survive the harsh environment, hunt, forage, breed and fight through an ever changing ecosystem.
